meanings.definition: Cause slight but persistent annoyance, discomfort, or anxiety.
meanings.sent1: The dripping faucet niggles me all night long.
meanings.sent2: The scratchy tag in my shirt niggles me.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel niggles the grumpy old cat.
meanings.sent4: The unresolved issue niggles at the back of my mind.
meanings.sent5: The persistent buzzing of the fly niggles like a tiny drumbeat.

meanings.definition: A slight feeling of annoyance or discomfort.
meanings.sent1: The constant niggles in my stomach made me uneasy.
meanings.sent2: Her niggles about the noisy neighbors were understandable.
meanings.sent3: The little niggles of worry danced in his mind like butterflies.
meanings.sent4: The niggles of doubt crept into her thoughts like shadows.
meanings.sent5: The niggles of uncertainty gnawed at him like tiny mice.
